amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 1002 of the bill which prohibits the Capitol Police from operating a mounted horse unit during fiscal year 2006 or any succeeding fiscal year.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 109-144 to strike the language in the bill prohibiting the Capitol Police from operating a mounted horse unit, and requiring the transfer of the current horses and equipment to the U.S. Park Police.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Mrs. Davis, Jo Ann.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis, Jo Ann amendment Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 226 (Roll no. 300).
